name: Zmey
description: The Zmey is a huge dragon with three heads, known for its impressive physical power, formidable claws, and fiery breath. It possesses a sleek, scaly body and multiple sharp teeth.
memorable: Its three heads grant it advantageous saving throws and its regeneration ability makes it a tough opponent to defeat.
goals: To wreak havoc and dominate its territory using its physical power and elemental breath attacks.
relations: May be encountered with other dragons or creatures drawn to its chaotic nature.
environment: Typically found in mountainous terrains or areas where it can take to the skies.
strengths: Has regeneration ability and multiple heads that provide advantage on saving throws.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to acid and fire damage that can negate its regeneration abilities.
attacks: Makes multiple claw and bite attacks, unleashes a powerful fire breath in a 30-foot cone.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath, capable of dealing up to 49 fire damage in a wide area.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet and passive Perception of 18.
skills: Skilled in Perception with a bonus of +8, indicating acute awareness.
additional_information: Can breathe air and water, making it amphibious.
Regenerates 15 hit points if not damaged by acid or fire.
Uses legendary actions for tactical flexibility in combat.
test_queries: chaotic evil creature with regeneration abilities
dragon that can breathe fire and water
